Verses: 1 manaase Raajaavaagirapodhu Pannirandu Vayadhaayirundhu, Aimbaththaindhu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Avan Thaayinper Epsibaal.
2 karththar Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaagath Thuraththina Jaadhigaludaiya Aruvaruppugalinpadiye, Avan Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu,

3 than Thagappanaagiya Esekkiyaa Idiththuppotta Medaigalaith Thirumbavum Katti, Paagaalukku Balipeedangalai Eduppiththu, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Aagaab Seydhadhupola Vikkiragaththoppai Undaakki, Vaanaththin Senaigalaiyellaam Panindhukondu Avaigalai Seviththaan.
4 erusalemile En Naamaththai Vilangappannuven Endru Karththar Sollik Kuriththa Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Avan Balipeedangalaik Katti,
5 karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Irandu Praagaarangalilum Vaanaththin Senaigalukkellaam Balipeedangalaik Katti,

6 than Kumaaranaith Theemidhikkappanni, Naalpaarkkiravanum Nimiththampaarkkiravanumaayirundhu, Anjanam Paarkkiravargalaiyum Kurisollugiravargalaiyum Vaiththu, Karththarukkuk Kobamundaaga Avar Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Migudhiyaai Seydhaan.

7 indha Aalayaththilum, Naan Isravelin Sagala Koththirangalilumirundhu Therindhukonda Erusalemilum, En Naamaththai Endraikkum Vilangappannuven Endru Karththar Dhaaveedhodum Avan Kumaaranaagiya Saalomonodum Sollik Kuriththa Aalayaththile Avan Pannina Thoppuvikkiragaththai Vaiththaan.

8 naan Avargalukkuk Karpiththa Ellaavatrinpadiyeyum, En Dhaasanaagiya Mose Avargalukkuk Karpiththa Ellaa Nyaayappramaanaththinpadiyeyum Seyya Jaakkiradhaiyaai Irundhaargaleyaanaal, Naan Ini Isravelin Kaalai Avargal Pidhaakkalukkuk Koduththa Dhesaththaivittu Alaiyappannuvadhillai Endru Solliyirundhaar.
9 aanaalum Avargal Kelaadheponaargal; Karththar Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaaga Azhiththa Jaadhigal Seydha Pollaappaippaarkkilum Adhigamaai Seyya Manaase Avargalai Evivittaan.
10 aagaiyaal Karththar Theerkkadharisigalaagiya Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararaik Kondu Uraiththadhu:

11 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Manaase Thanakku Munnirundha Emoriyar Seydha Ellaavatraippaarkkilum Kedaaga Indha Aruvaruppugalai Seydhu, Than Naragalaana Vikkiragangalaal Yoodhaavaiyum Paavancheyyappanninapadiyinaal,

12 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho, Ketkappogira Yaavarudaiya Irandu Kaadhugalilum Adhu Thoniththukkondirukkumpadiyaana Pollaappai Naan Erusaleminmelum Yoodhaavinmelum Varappanni,

13 erusaleminmel Samaariyaavin Mattanoolaiyum Aagaab Veettin Thookku Noolaiyum Pidippen; Oruvan Oru Thaalaththaith Thudaiththup Pinbu Adhaik Kavizhththuvaikkiradhupola Erusalemaith Thudaiththuviduven.

14 avargal Thangal Pidhaakkal Egipthilirundhu Purappatta Naalmudharkondu Innaalvaraikkum En Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Enakkuk Kobam Moottivandhapadiyinaal, En Sudhandharaththin Meedhiyaanadhaik Kaivittu, Avargal Pagaignarin Kaiyil Avargalai Oppukkoduppen.
15 thangal Pagaignarukkellaam Kollaiyum Sooraiyumaaip Povaargal Endraar.

16 karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seyyumpadiyaaga, Manaase Yoodhaavaip Paavancheyyappannina Andhap Paavamum Thavira, Avan Erusalemai Naalu Moolaivaraiyum Raththappazhigalaal Nirappaththakkadhaai, Kutramillaadha Raththaththaiyum Migudhiyaaga Sindhinaan.
17 manaaseyin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhavai Yaavum, Avan Seydha Paavamum Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
18 manaase Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avan Oosaavin Thottamaagiya Than Aramanaith Thottaththil Adakkampannappattaan; Avan Sthaanaththile Avan Kumaaranaagiya Aamon Raajaavaanaan.
19 aamon Raajaavaanapodhu Irubaththirandu Vayadhaayirundhu, Irandu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Yodhpaa Ooraanaagiya Aaroodhsin Kumaaraththiyaana Avan Thaayin Per Mesullemedh.
20 avan Than Thagappanaagiya Manaase Seydhadhupola, Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu,
21 than Thagappan Nadandha Ellaa Vazhiyilum Nadandhu, Than Thagappan Seviththa Naragalaana Vikkiragangalai Seviththu Avaigalaip Panindhukondu,
22 karththarin Vazhiyile Nadavaamal, Than Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Vittu Vittaan.
23 aamonin Oozhiyakkaarar Avanukku Virodhamaaik Kattuppaadu Panni, Raajaavai Avan Aramanaiyile Kondrupottaargal.
24 adhinaal Dhesaththu Janangal Raajaavaagiya Aamonukku Virodhamaaik Kattuppaadupanninavargalaiyellaam Vettippottu, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yosiyaavai Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaakkinaargal.
25 aamon Seydha Matra Varththamaanangal Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
26 avan Oosaavin Thottaththilulla Avanudaiya Kallaraiyil Adakkam Pannappattaan; Avan Sthaanaththile Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yosiyaa Raajaavaanaan.
